definition: to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: My first thought was of a TV movie I saw once about nuclear fallout.
sentences.chinese: 我的第一个念头是在一场电视中看过的原子弹落尘。

sentences.english: Inside a fallout of the fan, one is strong peach.
sentences.chinese: 屋内一柄落尘的扇子，依稀桃花正浓。

sentences.english: The fallout from these explosions fills the air.
Everyday 15 tons of dust smothers the site.
sentences.chinese: 每天有15吨落尘笼罩工地。

sentences.english: This ash soil, the fallout mud dust.
sentences.chinese: 这灰落尘入土，成泥成尘。

sentences.english: Barge to do beautiful mud broken dust eave, the dark corner swept away thousands of feet.
sentences.chinese: 驳离尽尽斑斓泥碎落尘一檐，暗角扫去红尘千丈。

definition: a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/two-character surname Murong
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
to bathe/to cleanse/to receive/to be given
